meanings.definition: An activity involving skill in making things by hand.
meanings.sent1: She learned the art of craft from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The craft fair showcased beautiful handmade items.
meanings.sent3: He tried to craft a birdhouse but ended up with a crooked mess.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to craft intricate jewelry amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The craft of pottery requires patience and precision.

meanings.definition: Skill in carrying out one's work.
meanings.sent1: His craft as a carpenter was evident in the sturdy furniture he made.
meanings.sent2: The chef's craft in the kitchen impressed the restaurant patrons.
meanings.sent3: She used her craft to fix the broken clock in a creative way.
meanings.sent4: His craft as a storyteller transported the audience to different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The craft of a surgeon is crucial in saving lives during operations.
